alert.note: Alert for Madison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 12:24PM CDT until June 10 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN LEAKE...NORTHEASTERN RANKIN...SCOTT AND SOUTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 1224 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Farmhaven to near Pisgah, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Forest, Carthage, Morton, Edinburg, Harperville, Homewood, Farmhaven, Tuscola, Goshen Springs, Ludlow, Pulaski, Hillsboro, Pisgah, Forkville, Branch, Walnut Grove, Lena and Standing Pine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
